#summary SQL Statements used to create datbase structure and sample data
#labels Phase-Design

= Database Structure Only =

{{{

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS "articles";

CREATE TABLE "articles" (
    "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY  AUTOINCREMENT  NOT NULL  UNIQUE , 
    "title" TEXT NOT NULL , 
    "description" TEXT NOT NULL , 
    "link" TEXT NOT NULL , 
    "pubdate" TEXT, 
    "author" TEXT, 
    "category" TEXT, 
    "comments" TEXT, 
    "guid" TEXT, 
    "source" TEXT, 
    "read" BOOL, 
    "deleted" BOOL, 
    "enclosure" TEXT);

}}}
